home.heroSubtitle: Stefan Vilceanu - AI Engineer & Software Developer

about.title: About Me
about.description: My name is Stefan Vilceanu, Iâ€™m an AI engineer and software developer with a passion for building intelligent systems that bridge cutting-edge research and real-world impact. My background spans machine learning, computer vision, robotics, and embedded systems, and I enjoy working across the full stack of technologies, from designing deep learning models and automation pipelines to developing robust software for connected and autonomous systems. I thrive on tackling complex problems, learning new tools and frameworks, and collaborating in multidisciplinary teams to create innovative, reliable solutions that make a difference.

project1.title: Lane Segmentation
project1.tech: YOLOPv2, IPM, Bayesian Filtering, ROS2, Docker
project1.description: YoloPv2 model used for lane line segmentation, IPM was applied to modify the perspective of the image to a Bird's Eye View perspective, and Bayesian Filtering was used to keep the lane localization and assignment algorithm stable.

project2.title: Comparison of Neural Networks for Efficient Inverse Dynamics Identification
project2.description: Trained, tested and compared several neural network architectures for predicting torque in robot joints of a 6-axis industrial robot.

project5.title: The Shape and Texture Bias for Object Recognition
